title: Integrative Medicine
description: Henry Ford's Center for Integrative Medicine uses traditional, holistic practices and complementary therapies to support your overall health and wellness.
cleaned_text: Alternative and holistic approaches to supporting your wellness Whether you are looking to relieve back pain, tap into a drug-free method to balance your digestion or manage the side effects of chemotherapy, integrative medicine can support your journey toward wellness and healing. What is integrative medicine? Integrative medicine is a holistic approach to health and healing that uses evidence-based, alternative therapies combined with traditional Western medical care to help you reach your individual wellness goals. At Henry Ford, our integrative medicine specialists look at you as a whole person rather than a single disease or condition -- taking into account your entire personal and medical history -- to design a care plan that's just for you. Our integrative medicine therapies are used to treat a variety of conditions for adults and older children, including [ anxiety](/services/behavioral-health/mental-health/conditions/anxiety) , chronic pain, stress, [sleep issues](/services/sleep-disorders) , [weight concerns](/services/weight-loss) and more.
